prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

A paradigm shift in software development is emerging, where plain human languages like English, French, or Latin will be used to write software that is both understandable and executable by humans and machines.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
